text.1027: [03] 187^b^.^eb^ upekkhaasahagato ^a^M4.0123^ea^ dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1028: [03] upekkhaasahagato dhammo naupekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena ^a^T4.0440^ea^ paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa pacchimaaya pacchimaaya upekkhaaya anantarapaccayena paccayo; upekkhaasahagata.m  cuticitta.m naupekkhaasahagatassa upapatticittassa... aavajjanaa naupekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...  vipaakamanodhaatu naupekkhaasahagataaya vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa... upekkhaasahagata.m  bhava"nga.m naupekkhaasahagatassa bhava"ngassa... upekkhaasahagata.m kusalaakusala.m naupekkhaasahagatassa  vu.t.thaanassa... kiriya.m vu.t.thaanassa... phala.m vu.t.thaanassa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m  naupekkhaasahagataaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1029: [03] upekkhaasahagato dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa ca naupekkhaasahagatassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m  upekkhaaya ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1030: [03] 188^b^.^eb^ naupekkhaasahagato dhammo naupekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa  purimaa upekkhaa pacchimaaya pacchimaaya upekkhaaya anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa purimaa  naupekkhaasahagataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m naupekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena  paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) purimaa purimaa upekkhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upekkhaasahagataana.m  khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo ^a^T4.0441^ea^; naupekkhaasahagata.m cuticitta.m upekkhaasahagatassa   ^a^V4.0145^ea^ upapatticittassa...  naupekkhaasahagata.m bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya... kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu vipaakamanodhaatuyaa... naupekkhaasahagataa  vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu kiriyamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa... naupekkhaasahagata.m ^a^M4.0124^ea^  bhava"nga.m upekkhaasahagatassa bhava"ngassa... naupekkhaasahagata.m kusalaakusala.m upekkhaasahagatassa  vu.t.thaanassa... kiriya.m vu.t.thaanassa... phala.m vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1031: [03] naupekkhaasahagato dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa ca naupekkhaasahagatassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa upekkhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m upekkhaaya  ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1032: [03] 189^b^.^eb^ upekkhaasahagato ca naupekkhaasahagato ca dhammaa upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- purimaa purimaa upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa ca upekkhaa ca pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m  upekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) purimaa purimaa  upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa ca upekkhaa ca pacchimaaya pacchimaaya upekkhaaya anantarapaccayena paccayo;  upekkhaasahagata.m cuticitta~nca upekkhaa ca naupekkhaasahagatassa upapatticittassa... aavajjanaa  ca upekkhaa ca naupekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m... vipaakamanodhaatu ca upekkhaa ca naupekkhaasahagataaya  vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa... upekkhaasahagata.m bhava"nga~nca upekkhaa ca naupekkhaasahagatassa  bhava"ngassa... upekkhaasahagata.m kusalaakusala~nca upekkhaa ca naupekkhaasahagatassa vu.t.thaanassa...  kiriya~nca ^a^T4.0442^ea^ upekkhaa ca vu.t.thaanassa... phala~nca upekkhaa ca vu.t.thaanassa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana~nca upekkhaa ca naupekkhaasahagataaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) purimaa purimaa upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa ca upekkhaa ca  pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upekkhaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m upekkhaaya ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.1033: [03] samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...  nava... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava.
text.1035: [03] 190^b^.^eb^ upekkhaasahagato ^a^V4.0146^ea^ dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.1036: [03] naupekkhaasahagato ^a^M4.0125^ea^ dhammo naupekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo --  naupekkhaasahagata.m saddha.m upanissaaya naupekkhaasahagatena cittena daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m...pe0... naupekkhaasahagata.m jhaana.m...pe0... vipassana.m...pe0...  magga.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; naupekkhaasahagata.m  siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... dosa.m... moha.m... maana.m... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m...  kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upekkha.m  upanissaaya naupekkhaasahagatena cittena daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m  hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; naupekkhaasahagataa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m upekkhaa  ca naupekkhaasahagataaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya... raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya... kaayikassa  sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa ^a^T4.0443^ea^... maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upekkhaaya ca upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1037: [03] naupekkhaasahagato dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tii.nipi upanissayaa).  naupekkhaasahagata.m saddha.m upanissaaya upekkhaasahagatena cittena daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m  uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; naupekkhaasahagata.m siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m  upekkha.m upanissaaya upekkhaasahagatena cittena daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti,  upekkhaasahagatena cittena adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m...pe0... sampha.m...pe0...  sandhi.m...pe0... nillopa.m...pe0... ekaagaarika.m...pe0... paripanthe...pe0...  paradaara.m...pe0... gaamaghaata.m...pe0... nigamaghaata.m karoti; naupekkhaasahagataa saddhaa...pe0...  senaasana.m upekkhaa ca upekkhaasahagataaya saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya... maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
text.1038: [03] naupekkhaasahagato ^a^V4.0147^ea^ dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa ca naupekkhaasahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo (tii.ni upanissayaa dutiyagamanasadisaa). (3)
text.1039: [03] upekkhaasahagato ca naupekkhaasahagato ca dhammaa upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...  tii.ni.
text.1041: [03] 191^b^.^eb^ naupekkhaasahagato ^a^M4.0126^ea^ dhammo naupekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo... tii.ni (sappiitikadukasadisaa).
text.1043: [03] 192^b^.^eb^ upekkhaasahagato dhammo naupekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni...  aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava... kammapaccayena paccayo... cha. (cattaari sahajaataa  naanaakkha.nikaa kaatabbaa ^a^T4.0444^ea^, dve naanaakkha.nikaa ca.)... vipaakapaccayena paccayo...  nava... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... indriyapaccayena paccayo... nava... jhaanapaccayena  paccayo... nava... maggapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo...  cha... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca... atthipaccayena paccayo... nava... natthipaccayena  paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (imaani paccayaani sappiitikakara.nena  vibhajitabbaani.)
text.1046: [03] 193^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa cattaari, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava,   anantare nava, samanantare nava ^a^V4.0148^ea^,  sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate  tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme cha, vipaake nava, aahaare cattaari, indriye nava, jhaane  nava, magge cattaari, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate  nava, avigate nava.
text.1047: [03] (eva.m paccaniiyavibha"ngopi itare tii.ni ga.nanaapi sappiitikadukasadisaa kaatabbaa.)
text.1053: [03] 194^b^.^eb^ kaamaavacara.m ^a^T4.0445^ea^ ^a^M4.0127^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca kaamaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  kaamaavacara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m). kaamaavacara.m  dhamma.m pa.ticca nakaamaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca  nakaamaavacaraa khandhaa. kaamaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kaamaavacaro ca nakaamaavacaro ca dhammaa  uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca nakaamaavacaraa khandhaa, mahaabhuute  pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)
text.1054: [03] 195^b^.^eb^ nakaamaavacara.m ^a^V4.0149^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca nakaamaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nakaamaavacara.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  nakaamaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kaamaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nakaamaavacare  khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne nakaamaavacare khandhe pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m.  nakaamaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kaamaavacaro ca nakaamaavacaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa --  nakaamaavacara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
text.1055: [03] 196^b^.^eb^ kaamaavacara~nca nakaamaavacara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca kaamaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa  ^a^T4.0446^ea^ -- nakaamaavacare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne nakaamaavacare  khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. kaamaavacara~nca nakaamaavacara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca  nakaamaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne nakaamaavacara.m eka.m khandha~nca  vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0.... kaamaavacara~nca nakaamaavacara~nca  dhamma.m pa.ticca kaamaavacaro ca nakaamaavacaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne  nakaamaavacara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0...  nakaamaavacare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3) (sa.mkhitta.m.)
text.1058: [03] 197^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M4.0128^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare cattaari,  samanantare cattaari, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  dve, aasevane dve, kamme nava, vipaake nava, aahaare nava, indriye nava, jhaane nava,  magge nava, sampayutte cattaari, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate  cattaari, avigate nava.

text.1120: [03] 210^b^.^eb^ nakaamaavacaro dhammo nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nakaamaavacaraadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. nakaamaavacaro dhammo kaamaavacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati ^a^T4.0455^ea^, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati  assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, ariyaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati ^a^M4.0135^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...pe0...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, dibba.m cakkhu.m...pe0... dibba.m  sotadhaatu.m...pe0... iddhividha~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati,  nakaamaavacare khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nakaamaavacaraadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo; nakaamaavacaro dhammo kaamaavacarassa ca nakaamaavacarassa ca dhammassa  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nakaamaavacaraadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.1129: [03] 214^b^.^eb^ nakaamaavacaro dhammo nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --   ^baaramma.nuupanissayo ^a^T4.0458^ea^,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...b^. pakatuupanissayo -- nakaamaavacara.m  saddha.m upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti, magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m  uppaadeti; nakaamaavacara.m siila.m ^a^M4.0137^ea^ ...pe0... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya nakaamaavacara.m  jhaana.m uppaadeti...pe0... magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti;  nakaamaavacaraa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa nakaamaavacaraaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, maggassa,  phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; pa.thama.m jhaana.m dutiyassa jhaanassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m...pe0... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa ^a^V4.0161^ea^...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo; pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa...pe0... dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa...pe0...  tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; maggo phalasamaapattiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.1132: [03] 215^b^.^eb^ kaamaavacaro dhammo kaamaavacarassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  ...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu kaamaavacaraana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. kaamaavacaro  dhammo ^a^M4.0138^ea^ nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya  sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu nakaamaavacaraana.m khandhaana.m  purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.1142: [03] 218^b^.^eb^ kaamaavacaro ^a^M4.0139^ea^ ^a^V4.0163^ea^ dhammo kaamaavacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). kaamaavacaro  dhammo nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m ^a^T4.0461^ea^, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ --  pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu nakaamaavacaraana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ --  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati...pe0... text.1144: [03] 219^b^.^eb^ kaamaavacaro ca nakaamaavacaro ca dhammaa kaamaavacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nakaamaavacaraa khandhaa  ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nakaamaavacaraa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nakaamaavacaraa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. kaamaavacaro ca nakaamaavacaro ca dhammaa nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena  paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- nakaamaavacaro eko khandho ca  vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1147: [03] 220^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V4.0164^ea^ cattaari, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa cattaari  ^a^T4.0462^ea^, anantare cattaari,  samanantare cattaari, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari,  purejaate dve, pacchaajaate dve, aasevane ^a^M4.0140^ea^ tii.ni, kamme cattaari, vipaake  cattaari, aahaare cattaari, indriye cattaari, jhaane cattaari, magge cattaari, sampayutte  dve, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate satta.
text.1149: [03] 221^b^.^eb^ kaamaavacaro dhammo kaamaavacarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo.  kaamaavacaro dhammo nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1150: [03] 222^b^.^eb^ nakaamaavacaro dhammo nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. nakaamaavacaro dhammo kaamaavacarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. nakaamaavacaro dhammo kaamaavacarassa ca nakaamaavacarassa  ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1151: [01] kaamaavacaro ca nakaamaavacaro ca dhammaa kaamaavacarassa ^a^T4.0463^ea^ dhammassa sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m,  aahaara.m ^a^V4.0165^ea^, indriya.m. kaamaavacaro ca nakaamaavacaro ca dhammaa nakaamaavacarassa dhammassa  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. (2)
text.1154: [03] 223^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta, naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare  satta, na sahajaate cha, naa~n~nama~n~ne cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate cha...pe0...  nasampayutte cha, navippayutte ^a^M4.0141^ea^ pa~nca, noatthiyaa pa~nca, nonatthiyaa satta,  novigate satta, noavigate pa~nca.
text.1156: [03] 224^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne cattaari, naadhipatiyaa cattaari, naanantare cattaari, nasamanantare  cattaari, naa~n~nama~n~ne dve, naupanissaye cattaari...pe0... nasampayutte dve, navippayutte  dve, nonatthiyaa cattaari, novigate cattaari.
text.1158: [03] 225^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa cattaari (anulomamaatikaa kaatabbaa)...pe0...  avigate satta.
text.1164: [03] 226^b^.^eb^ ruupaavacara.m ^a^T4.0464^ea^ ^a^V4.0166^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- ruupaavacara.m eka.m  khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  ruupaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca naruupaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- ruupaavacare khandhe  pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ruupaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca  ruupaavacaro ca naruupaavacaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- ruupaavacara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca  tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (3)
text.1165: [03] 227^b^.^eb^ naruupaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca naruupaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- naruupaavacara.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne  ^a^M4.0142^ea^ ...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0.... naruupaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaro  dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaraa khandhaa. naruupaavacara.m  dhamma.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaro ca naruupaavacaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne  vatthu.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaraa khandhaa, mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)
text.1166: [03] 228^b^.^eb^ ruupaavacara~nca naruupaavacara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  pa.tisandhikkha.ne ruupaavacara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe  ca...pe0.... ruupaavacara~nca naruupaavacara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca ^a^T4.0465^ea^ naruupaavacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  ruupaavacare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^V4.0167^ea^ ruupaavacare  khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. ruupaavacara~nca naruupaavacara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaro  ca naruupaavacaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne ruupaavacara.m eka.m khandha~nca  vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0... ruupaavacare khandhe ca mahaabhuute  ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (3)
text.1169: [03] 229^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare cattaari, samanantare  cattaari, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  dve, aasevane dve, kamme nava, vipaake nava, jhaane nava, magge nava, sampayutte cattaari,  vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate nava.
text.1172: [03] 230^b^.^eb^ naruupaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca naruupaavacaro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m  naruupaavacara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m  mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... text.1175: [03] 231^b^.^eb^ ruupaavacara.m ^a^V4.0168^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaro dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa  ^a^T4.0466^ea^ -- ruupaavacare  khandhe pa.ticca ruupaavacaraadhipati vipaaka.m, ruupaavacara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0...  dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ruupaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca naruupaavacaro  dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa -- vipaake ruupaavacare khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m  ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ruupaavacara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca ruupaavacaro ca naruupaavacaro  ca dhammaa uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayaa -- vipaaka.m ruupaavacara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa  cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... text.1332: [03] 280^b^.^eb^ aruupaavacaro dhammo aruupaavacarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aruupaavacaro dhammo naaruupaavacarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m paccavekkhati, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...pe0...  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati, aruupaavacare khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena aruupaavacaracittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aruupaavacaraa khandhaa  cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1333: [03] naaruupaavacaro dhammo naaruupaavacarassa ^a^T4.0490^ea^ dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0...  siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m  aarabbha raago...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0...  ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti ^a^M4.0163^ea^,  nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0...  pubbe...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m naaruupaavacare khandhe aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati,  cetopariya~naa.nena naaruupaavacaracittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m ^a^V4.0192^ea^ kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... naaruupaavacaraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1335: [03] 281^b^.^eb^ aruupaavacaro dhammo aruupaavacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  aruupaavacaraadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aruupaavacaro dhammo  naaruupaavacarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, aruupaavacare ^a^T4.0491^ea^ khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aruupaavacaraadhipati  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) aruupaavacaraadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

text.1338: [03] 283^b^.^eb^ aruupaavacaro ^a^M4.0164^ea^ dhammo aruupaavacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa  ^a^V4.0193^ea^ purimaa aruupaavacaraa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aruupaavacaraana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena  paccayo. aruupaavacaro dhammo naaruupaavacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- aruupaavacara.m  cuticitta.m naaruupaavacarassa upapatticittassa, aruupaavacara.m bhava"nga.m ^a^T4.0492^ea^ aavajjanaaya, aruupaavacaraa  khandhaa naaruupaavacarassa vu.t.thaanassa, nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.1339: [03] 284^b^.^eb^ naaruupaavacaro dhammo naaruupaavacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa  purimaa naaruupaavacaraa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m naaruupaavacaraana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena  paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. naaruupaavacaro dhammo aruupaavacarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- naaruupaavacara.m  cuticitta.m aruupaavacarassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; naaruupaavacaraa khandhaa  aruupaavacarassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; aakaasaana~ncaayatanassa parikamma.m aakaasaana~ncaayatanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo; vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatanassa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa  parikamma.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.1342: [03] 285^b^.^eb^ aruupaavacaro dhammo aruupaavacarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo; vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m aaki~nca~n~naayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  ^a^T4.0493^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. aruupaavacaro dhammo naaruupaavacarassa  dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo ^a^M4.0165^ea^ -- aruupaavacara.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m karoti ^a^V4.0194^ea^, naaruupaavacara.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m...pe0... magga.m...pe0...  abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; aruupaavacara.m  siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti...  maana.m jappeti... di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; aruupaavacaraa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa naaruupaavacaraaya saddhaaya...pe0...  pa~n~naaya... raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya... kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa...  maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.1346: [03] 287^b^.^eb^ naaruupaavacaro dhammo naaruupaavacarassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati,  ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ --  cakkhaayatana.m ^a^M4.0166^ea^ ^a^V4.0195^ea^ cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  vatthu naaruupaavacaraana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. naaruupaavacaro dhammo aruupaavacarassa  dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu aruupaavacaraana.m khandhaana.m  purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.1360: [03] 292^b^.^eb^ aruupaavacaro ca naaruupaavacaro ca dhammaa aruupaavacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. sahajaato -- aruupaavacaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... aruupaavacaro ca naaruupaavacaro  ca dhammaa naaruupaavacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m,  indriya.m. sahajaataa -- aruupaavacaraa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- aruupaavacaraa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro ^a^V4.0197^ea^ aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- aruupaavacaraa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m  atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1361: [03] natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.
text.1363: [03] 293^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa cattaari, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare cattaari, samanantare  cattaari, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  dve, pacchaajaate dve, aasevane tii.ni, kamme cattaari, vipaake dve, aahaare cattaari,  indriye ^a^M4.0168^ea^ cattaari, jhaane cattaari, magge cattaari ^a^T4.0497^ea^, sampayutte dve, vippayutte  tii.ni, atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate satta.

text.1419: [03] 311^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa cattaari, naanantare tii.ni...pe0...  naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane eka.m, nakamme  cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m,  nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.1424: [03] 312^b^.^eb^ niyyaanika.m ^a^T4.0504^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho niyyaaniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --   niyyaanika.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.1425: [03] aniyyaanika.m ^a^M4.0174^ea^ ^a^V4.0205^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aniyyaaniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  aniyyaanika.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.1426: [03] hetuyaa dve, aaramma.ne dve (sabbattha dve), vipaake eka.m...pe0... avigate dve (anuloma.m).
text.1427: [03] nahetuyaa eka.m, naadhipatiyaa dve, napurejaate dve, napacchaajaate dve, naaasevane eka.m,  nakamme dve, navipaake dve, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte dve (paccaniiya.m).
text.1433: [03] 313^b^.^eb^ niyyaaniko dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- niyyaanikaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) niyyaanikaa  hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) niyyaanikaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1434: [03] aniyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aniyyaanikaa hetuu  ^a^V4.0206^ea^ sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo  ^a^T4.0505^ea^; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.1436: [03] 314^b^.^eb^ niyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, cetopariya~naa.nena niyyaanikacittasama"ngissa citta.m  jaanaati, niyyaanikaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1437: [03] aniyyaaniko ^a^M4.0175^ea^ dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0...  jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m  gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine  kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m aniyyaanike khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa  ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena aniyyaanikacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... aniyyaanikaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo.
text.1438: [03] aniyyaaniko ^a^T4.0506^ea^ dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1440: [03] 315^b^.^eb^ niyyaaniko ^a^V4.0207^ea^ dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  niyyaanikaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. niyyaaniko  dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- niyyaanikaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) niyyaanikaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1441: [03] 316^b^.^eb^ aniyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0...  ariyaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti ^a^M4.0176^ea^, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti,  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m aniyyaanike khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aniyyaanikaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m ^a^T4.0507^ea^ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aniyyaaniko dhammo  niyyaanikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1443: [03] 317^b^.^eb^ niyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- maggo phalassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1444: [03] aniyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  aniyyaanikaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aniyyaanikaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena  paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m  phalasamaapattiyaa ^a^V4.0208^ea^... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. aniyyaaniko dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo... gotrabhu maggassa; vodaana.m maggassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1445: [03] samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...  dve... nissayapaccayena paccayo... satta.
text.1447: [03] 318^b^.^eb^ niyyaaniko dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ --  pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... tatiyo maggo  catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. niyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo^eb^  ^a^T4.0508^ea^, ^b^pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- ariyaa magga.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m samaapatti.m uppaadenti,  uppanna.m samaapajjanti, sa"nkhaare aniccato...pe0... vipassanti, maggo ariyaana.m  atthapa.tisambhidaaya...pe0... pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaaya .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa ^a^M4.0177^ea^  upanissayapaccayena paccayo, maggo phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1448: [03] 319^b^.^eb^ aniyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aniyyaanika.m  saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti...  vipassana.m... abhi~n~na.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti... maana.m jappeti... di.t.thi.m  ga.nhaati; aniyyaanika.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... utu.m...  bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m  hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; aniyyaanikaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m aniyyaanikaaya  saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya... kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa...  phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. aniyyaaniko dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamassa maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa ^a^V4.0209^ea^ maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  catutthassa maggassa parikamma.m catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1450: [03] 320^b^.^eb^ aniyyaaniko ^a^T4.0509^ea^ dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena   paccayo... dve (aruupadukasadisaa kaatabbaa)... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... dve... aasevanapaccayena  paccayo... dve.
text.1452: [03] 321^b^.^eb^ niyyaaniko dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- niyyaanikaa  cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. niyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa  dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- niyyaanikaa  cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- niyyaanikaa  cetanaa phalassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) niyyaanikaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1453: [03] 322^b^.^eb^ aniyyaaniko ^a^M4.0178^ea^ dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ (sa.mkhitta.m). ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- aniyyaanikaa  cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo... vipaakapaccayena  paccayo... eka.myeva... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... indriyapaccayena paccayo...  cattaari... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... maggapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... sampayuttapaccayena  paccayo... dve... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aruupadukasadisaa kaatabbaa)...  atthipaccayena paccayo... satta (aruupadukasadisaa kaatabbaa, aamasanaa naanaapadaayeva)...  natthipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... vigatapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... avigatapaccayena paccayo...  satta.
text.1455: [03] 323^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T4.0510^ea^ ^a^V4.0210^ea^ cattaari, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare tii.ni, samanantare  tii.ni, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  dve, pacchaajaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme cattaari, vipaake eka.m, aahaare cattaari,  indriye cattaari, jhaane cattaari, magge cattaari, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tii.ni,  atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa tii.ni, vigate tii.ni, avigate satta.
text.1458: [03] 324^b^.^eb^ niyyaaniko dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. niyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. niyyaaniko dhammo  niyyaanikassa ca aniyyaanikassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1459: [03] 325^b^.^eb^ aniyyaaniko dhammo aniyyaanikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena ^a^M4.0179^ea^ paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo.  aniyyaaniko dhammo niyyaanikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.1460: [01] niyyaaniko ca aniyyaaniko ca dhammaa niyyaanikassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, purejaata.m.  niyyaaniko ^a^T4.0511^ea^ ca aniyyaaniko ca dhammaa aniyyaanikassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m,  aahaara.m, indriya.m. (3)
text.1462: [03] 326^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V4.0211^ea^ satta, naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta,  nasahajaate pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nanissaye pa~nca, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate cha,  napacchaajaate satta...pe0... nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte cattaari, noatthiyaa cattaari,  nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattaari.
text.1464: [03] 327^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne cattaari, naadhipatiyaa cattaari, naanantare nasamanantare cattaari,  naa~n~nama~n~ne dve, naupanissaye cattaari ...pe0... nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve,  nonatthiyaa cattaari, novigate cattaari.
text.1466: [03] 328^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa pa~nca (anulomamaatikaa vitthaaretabbaa)...pe0...  avigate satta.
text.1470: [03] 329^b^.^eb^ niyata.m ^a^M4.0180^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa  ^a^T4.0512^ea^ -- niyata.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... niyata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca  aniyato dhammo uppajjati ^a^V4.0212^ea^ hetupaccayaa -- niyate khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m.  pa~ncapi pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. yathaa niyyaanikaduka.m eva.m pa.ticcavaaropi sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi  nissayavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi kaatabbaa, ninnaanaakara.na.m aamasana.m  naana.m).
text.1474: [03] 330^b^.^eb^ niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... cattaari (niyyaanikadukasadisaa  ninnaanaakara.naa).
text.1476: [03] 331^b^.^eb^ niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m paccavekkhanti, niyate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0...  niyate khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena niyatacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaanaati, niyataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1477: [03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati  assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aniyato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0...  uddhacca.m...pe0... aniyata.m domanassa.m uppajjati, ariyaa phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m  ^a^T4.0513^ea^ paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa ^a^M4.0181^ea^, vodaanassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya ^a^V4.0213^ea^  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa aniyate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite  kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniyate  khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aniyato  raago...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati...pe0... aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; nibbaana.m  maggassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ruupajiivitindriya.m maatughaatikammassa... pitughaatikammassa...  arahantaghaatikammassa... ruhiruppaadakammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ya.m vatthu.m  aamasantassa micchattaniyataa khandhaa uppajjanti, ta.m vatthu micchattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.1479: [03] 332^b^.^eb^ niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  niyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. niyato dhammo aniyatassa  dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  niyataadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. niyato dhammo niyatassa  ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- niyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  ^a^T4.0514^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.1480: [03] 333^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa aniyato raago uppajjati...  di.t.thi uppajjati; pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti,  nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniyate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m garu.m katvaa aniyato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aniyataadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ^a^M4.0182^ea^ ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena ^a^V4.0214^ea^ paccayo.  aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m  maggassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1482: [03] 334^b^.^eb^ niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo, niyataa khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1483: [03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aniyataa khandhaa  pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aniyataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...  anuloma.m vodaanassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa  vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa ^a^T4.0515^ea^ anantarapaccayena paccayo. aniyato  dhammo niyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- aniyata.m domanassa.m niyatassa domanassassa,  aniyataa micchaadi.t.thi niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo; gotrabhu maggassa...  vodaana.m maggassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1484: [03] samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...  dve... nissayapaccayena paccayo... satta.
text.1486: [03] 335^b^.^eb^ niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ --  maatughaatikamma.m maatughaatikammassa... pitughaatikammassa... arahantaghaatikammassa...  ruhiruppaadakammassa... sa"nghabhedakammassa, niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo  (cakka.m). pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa...pe0... tatiyo maggo catutthassa  maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo --  maatara.m jiivitaa voropetvaa...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti,  siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m ^a^M4.0183^ea^ karoti, ariyaa ^a^V4.0215^ea^ magga.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m  samaapatti.m uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti...pe0... .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo; maggo phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1487: [03] 336^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  ^a^T4.0516^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aniyata.m  saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti,  vipassana.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti...  di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; aniyata.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m  sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m  deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... nigamaghaata.m karoti,  aniyataa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m aniyataaya saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya... kaayikassa  sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1488: [03] aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aniyata.m raaga.m upanissaaya maatara.m  jiivitaa voropeti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; aniyata.m dosa.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya  maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; aniyato raago... dosa.m...pe0...  senaasana.m maatughaatikammassa...pe0... sa"nghabhedakammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo;  pa.thamassa maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa maggassa...pe0... catutthassa maggassa parikamma.m  catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.1490: [03] 337^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.napurejaata.m ^a^T4.0517^ea^, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupajiivitindriya.m maatughaatikammassa...  pitughaatikammassa... arahantaghaatikammassa... ruhiruppaadakammassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu niyataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.1491: [03] pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... dve... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... dve.
text.1493: [03] 338^b^.^eb^ niyato ^a^M4.0184^ea^ ^a^V4.0216^ea^ dhammo niyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- niyataa cetanaa  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena  paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- niyataa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- niyataa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m  ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) niyataa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1494: [03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.1495: [03] vipaakapaccayena paccayo... eka.m... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... indriyapaccayena  paccayo... cattaari... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... maggapaccayena paccayo... cattaari...  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... dve... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aruupadukasadisa.m)...  atthipaccayena paccayo... satta (aruupaavacaradukasadisa.m)... natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena  paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo... satta.
text.1497: [03] 339^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T4.0518^ea^ cattaari, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare tii.ni, samanantare  tii.ni, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  dve, pacchaajaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme cattaari, vipaake eka.m, aahaare cattaari,  indriye jhaane cattaari, magge cattaari, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa  satta, natthiyaa tii.ni, vigate tii.ni, avigate satta.
text.1499: [03] 340^b^.^eb^ niyato ^a^V4.0217^ea^ dhammo niyatassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^M4.0185^ea^ paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo.  niyato dhammo niyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1500: [03] 341^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...  kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. aniyato dhammo  niyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.1501: [03] niyato ^a^T4.0519^ea^ ca aniyato ca dhammaa niyatassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. niyato ca aniyato  ca dhammaa aniyatassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (2)
text.1503: [03] 342^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta, naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta,  nasahajaate pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nanissaye pa~nca, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate cha,  napacchaajaate satta...pe0... nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte cattaari, noatthiyaa cattaari,  nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattaari.
text.1505: [03] 343^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne cattaari, naadhipatiyaa   cattaari, naanantare nasamanantare cattaari ^a^V4.0218^ea^,  naa~n~nama~n~ne dve, naupanissaye cattaari...pe0... nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa  cattaari, novigate cattaari.
text.1507: [03] 344^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa pa~nca (anulomamaatikaa vitthaaretabbaa)...pe0...  avigate satta.
text.1511: [03] 345^b^.^eb^ sauttara.m ^a^T4.0520^ea^ ^a^M4.0186^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  sauttara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa. yathaa cuu.lantaraduke lokiyadukasadisa.m  ninnaanaakara.na.m.)

text.1521: [03] ara.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca ara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m ara.na.m eka.m khandha.m  pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). (1)
text.1522: [01] nahetuyaa dve, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, naanantare tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni,  napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate pa~nca, naaasevane pa~nca, nakamme dve, navipaake pa~nca,  naaahaare eka.m, naindriye ^a^M4.0187^ea^ eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte  tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.1528: [03] 347^b^.^eb^ sara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa sara.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sara.na.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa  tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (yathaa aruupaavacaradukassa paccayavaaropi eva.m  kaatabbo).
text.1529: [03] hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa nava...pe0... avigate nava.
text.1531: [03] 348^b^.^eb^ sara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa sara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate  uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato ^a^T4.0522^ea^ uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.1532: [03] ara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa ara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m ara.na.m eka.m khandha.m  paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... text.1534: [03] nahetuyaa ^a^M4.0188^ea^ cattaari, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni,  nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate  nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye  eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa  tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

text.1545: [03] 349^b^.^eb^ sara.no ^a^V4.0222^ea^ dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo (aruupadukasadisa.m, cattaari).
text.1547: [03] 350^b^.^eb^ sara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- raaga.m assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, di.t.thi.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, vicikiccha.m aarabbha ^a^M4.0189^ea^ ...pe0... uddhacca.m aarabbha...pe0...  domanassa.m aarabbha domanassa.m uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m  uppajjati. sara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa pahiine  kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0...  sara.ne khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena sara.nacittasama"ngissa citta.m  jaanaati. sara.naa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1548: [03] 351^b^.^eb^ ara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m  gotrabhussa ^a^T4.0524^ea^, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m ara.ne khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati ^a^V4.0223^ea^...pe0...  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa  ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... pubbe...pe0...  jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m, ara.ne khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha  raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. (2)
text.1550: [03] 352^b^.^eb^ sara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- raaga.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago  uppajjati... di.t.thi uppajjati; di.t.thi.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  sara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. sara.no dhammo ara.nassa  dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sara.naadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. sara.no dhammo sara.nassa ca ara.nassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1551: [03] 353^b^.^eb^ ara.no ^a^M4.0190^ea^ dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m ^a^T4.0525^ea^ ...pe0... uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati... di.t.thi uppajjati;  pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m, ara.ne khandhe  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati... di.t.thi uppajjati. text.1553: [03] 354^b^.^eb^ sara.no ^a^V4.0224^ea^ dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sara.naa khandhaa  pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sara.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. sara.no dhammo ara.nassa  dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- sara.naa khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.1554: [03] 355^b^.^eb^ ara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ara.naa  khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ara.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0...  phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. ara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- aavajjanaa sara.naana.m ^a^T4.0526^ea^ khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.1555: [03] samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...  dve... nissayapaccayena paccayo... satta.
text.1557: [03] 356^b^.^eb^ sara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo ^a^M4.0191^ea^ --  raaga.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; dosa.m...pe0... patthana.m upanissaaya  paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati, raago...pe0... patthanaa raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. sara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- raaga.m upanissaaya  daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m...pe0...  magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti; dosa.m...pe0... patthana.m  upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, raago...pe0... patthanaa  saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya... kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa... maggassa...  phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1558: [03] 357^b^.^eb^ ara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --   ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^V4.0225^ea^,  ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya  daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti; siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... kaayika.m  sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m  deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti; saddhaa ^a^T4.0527^ea^ ...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0...  pa~n~naaya... kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa... maggassa... phalasamaapattiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.1559: [01] ara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti,  di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m  bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.1561: [03] 358^b^.^eb^ ara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m.  ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati...pe0...  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa  ^a^M4.0192^ea^ ...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu ara.naana.m khandhaana.m  purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m  assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati.  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sara.naana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.1562: [03] pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... dve... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... dve.
text.1564: [03] 359^b^.^eb^ sara.no ^a^T4.0528^ea^ dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sara.naa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m.) sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^  ^a^V4.0226^ea^ -- sara.naa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ --  sara.naa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m  kaatabba.m.) sara.naa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena  paccayo. (3)
text.1565: [03] ara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. sahajaataa --  (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.1566: [03] vipaakapaccayena paccayo... eka.m... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... indriyapaccayena  paccayo... cattaari... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... cattaari... maggapaccayena paccayo... cattaari...  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... dve... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aruupadukasadisaa).
text.1568: [03] 360^b^.^eb^ sara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). sara.no dhammo  ara.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). sara.no  dhammo sara.nassa ca ara.nassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). text.1569: [03] 361^b^.^eb^ ara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). ara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m ^a^M4.0193^ea^ ...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m ^a^T4.0529^ea^ aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, vatthu sara.naana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.1570: [03] sara.no ca ara.no ca dhammaa sara.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m  (sa.mkhitta.m). sara.no ca ara.no ca dhammaa ara.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sara.naa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sara.naa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro  ^a^V4.0227^ea^ ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sara.naa   khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca  ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1573: [03] 362^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa cattaari, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare cattaari, samanantare  cattaari, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  dve, pacchaajaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme cattaari, vipaake eka.m, aahaare cattaari,  indriye cattaari, jhaane cattaari, magge cattaari, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tii.ni,  atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate satta.
text.1575: [03] 363^b^.^eb^ sara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. sara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena ^a^T4.0530^ea^ paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo.  sara.no dhammo sara.nassa ca ara.nassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1576: [03] 364^b^.^eb^ ara.no dhammo ara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...  kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena ^a^M4.0194^ea^ paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo.  ara.no dhammo sara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo...  purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1577: [03] sara.no ^a^V4.0228^ea^ ca ara.no ca dhammaa sara.nassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. sara.no ca ara.no ca  dhammaa ara.nassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (2)
text.1580: [03] 365^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajaate pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nanissaye pa~nca,  naupanissaye satta, napurejaate cha, napacchaajaate satta...pe0... nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte  cattaari, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattaari.
text.1582: [03] 366^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne cattaari, naadhipatiyaa cattaari...pe0... nasamanantare cattaari,  naa~n~nama~n~ne dve, naupanissaye cattaari...pe0... nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa  cattaari ^a^T4.0531^ea^, novigate cattaari.
text.1584: [03] 367^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare cattaari (anulomamaatikaa  gahetabbaa)...pe0... avigate satta.
